dct_title_s: Goldthwaite's map of the United States & Canada : exhibiting the railroads with their distances, single and double track & width of gauge.
dct_alternative_sm: and the time compared with noon at Washington and Greenwich.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown using hachures.;1 map, colored;67 x 77 cm., fold in cover 28 x 23 cm.;ca. 1:7,315,200
